boardgame.description: The abstract game of Qwirkle consists of 108 wooden blocks with six different shapes in six different colors. There is no board, players simply use an available flat surface._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players begin the game with six blocks. The start player places blocks of a single matching attribute (color or shape but not both) on the table. Thereafter, a player adds blocks adjacent to at least one previously played block. The blocks must all be played in a line and match, without duplicates, either the color or shape of the previous block._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players score one point for each block played plus all blocks adjacent. It is possible for a block to score in more than one direction. If a player completes a line containing all six shapes or colors, an additional six points are scored. The player then refills his hand to six blocks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when the draw bag is depleted and one player plays all of his remaining blocks, earning a six point bonus. The player with the high score wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

MindWare (MWR 32016) While Qwirkle is as simple as matching colors and shapes, it is a game that also requires tactical maneuvers and well-planned strategy. The game consists of 108 wooden blocks with six different shapes in six colors. Using the blocks, players attempt to score the most points by building lines that share a common attribute - either color or shape. Qwirkle is a quick game to learn, but you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll soon discover that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to think strategically in order to score the most points. Ages 6 and up. 2007 Mensa Select 2007 Parents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Choice Gold Award 2007 Major Fun Award 2008 Games Magazine Best Family Game Runner-Up

Very good condition. Comes with cloth bag for storage! This is the edition that had quality control issues, so has duller colors and some knicks to wooden pieces, but since pieces are picked out of a bag, the quality is not important to game play. Shipping is $10.

MindWare (MWR 32016) MindWare_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Most Awarded Game Of All Time
Mensa Select Award Annually, Mensans judge and critique games released in the past year and award the coveted Mensa Select seal to the top five. Games are judged on aesthetics, instructions, originality, play appeal and play value.
Parents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Choice Gold Award Founded in 1978, Parents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Choice is the nation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s oldest nonprofit consumer guide to quality children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s books, toys, music and more. The Parents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Choice Award seals are recognized throughout the country as the premier mark of achievement in the children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s media industry. The Parents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Choice Gold Awards are given to those products that are judged as the highest quality and most appealing in their genre. Criteria for judgments include the highest production standards, universal human values and a unique, individual quality that pushes the product a notch above others.
Major Fun Award The Major FUN Award goes to games that make people laugh, are original, flexible and easy to adapt, are well-made, durable and easily stored, and are easy to understand and teach. Award winners are selected during monthly gatherings attended by a collection of game-players and the winning games are reviewed by Major FUN himself.
Qwirkle is as simple as matching colors and shapes, but this game also requires tactical maneuvers and well-planned strategy. Earn points by building rows and columns of blocks that share a common shape or color. Look for opportunities to score big by placing a tile that touches multiple pieces with matching attributes. The player with the most points wins! 108 wooden blocks. 2 to 4 players.
Reserved for Steve Wagner from Geekbay Auction.

Box has very light shelf wear. Lid is slightly dished. While counting the tiles I noticed some have tiny chips out of them. Otherwise parts are in excellent condition ============================================== The games I am selling come from my personal collection. I often have bought games used or traded for them. I will do my best to accurately describe their condition. I will confirm completeness in most cases (unless stated otherwise) but not for items that come in large quantities for which a few missing will make no difference (like stacks of paper money for example). Please note that I am not concerned about inserts and may have removed them from a game that I felt didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need them. I might not think to mention that in the description. If you are interested in the insert, please ask. Note that our home is smoke-free but not pet-free. I can not guarantee the complete absence of cat hair in the boxes I prefer to ship via USPS Priority. I use non-Flat Rate boxes unless it will save you money for me to use Flat Rate boxes. I buy the postage on-line and charge the exact cost to the buyer. I am happy to combine multiple items to save you on shipping I have perfect feedback here on BGG. On ebay, where I am selling my record collection, I am ronattic, and have 100% positive feedback. So please buy with confidence.
